_xResult.title: Tix Linen Jacket
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made open-front jacket with long sleeves
_xResult.longdesc:
We are much too familiar with the constant summer struggle for women: You want the sun to kiss your shoulders when you're outdoors but the instant you walk inside, the chilly blast of A/C almost makes that summer dream not even worth it. Well, here's your solution. It's a short, linen, open front jacket, easy enough to tuck into your purse. The best part? You don't have to worry about wrinkles.

 

This ever-so-slightly cropped summer jacket is made from a medium-weight, 100% linen fabric.  It is available in 31 different colors so be sure to check the color palette in the last picture and provide your color preference information during checkout. It normally checks in at a length of approximately 25" (64cm) so if you'd like a different length, also let Shantima know that.

 

Shantima uses only Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees to you that it meets human - ecological requirements. The fabric comes pre-washed and softened so you can be certain it will shrink no more.

properties.propvalue: Gentle machine wash on low temperatures with soft washing agents. Machine drying in the most gentle way, please use cool temperature. Avoid overdrying.  No ironing required to maintain relaxed and wrinkled texture.
